channel.title: Making a non-silabsoft server silabs?
channel.description:
I am experimenting at the moment, and since every site deleted their guide, how would I make a server with no silab items, capable of holding silab items? All I remember is that you need to change some ints to 10000, but thats it.
So if anyone has a guide, or can please tell me how to do it, go ahead :P

item.title: Making a non-silabsoft server silabs?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

You modify your pickup command, add the item IDs into the correct the correct item slots using item.java.

Read full topic

I figured it out, thanks anyways. And I can just replace the item.cfg with one from like All-Star or something

not sure but…
You have to update your item.cfg to hold silab items
next you need to add the item’s that can be worn to Item.java
next you need to add attacking adimations to the silab weapons [im such a bad speller]
update your pickupcommand[if needed]
